items.headline: Actions you can take today that will change your brain chemistry and mindset to be Happy Now, Tomorrow & Forever

You will get actionable plans to change your mood to one that is Happy Now, Happy Tomorrow and Happy Forever.
You'll get 36 videos, a 60 page workbook and two additional workbooks designed to help you be Happy. Use them and you will be HAPPY!

items.headline: Based on the International Bestselling Book, 'Let That 'Stuff' Go'. Life is stressful, but it doesn't have to be.
objectives_summary: This course will cover practical tips on how to find more peace and happiness in your everyday. It uses modern mindful techniques to let go of all we hold onto and put life into perspective, accept what you can't control, take time for yourself guilt-free, live more authentically, learn the art of forgiveness, find your tech zen, learn how to become more aware of your self smack-talk and more.
